course_description: The purpose of this course is to broaden and refine laboratory and analytical skills, to further mastery of several fields of physics, and to write lab reports in the style of journal papers.  Various advanced experiments may include quantum entanglement, atomic force microscopy, and pulsed nuclear magnetic resonance.
sections:
